00023 #include <Porosites.h>
00024 #include <Probleme_base.h>
00025 #include <Equation_base.h>
00026 #include <Zone_VF.h>
00027 #include <Param.h>
00028 
00029 // Generalisation pour les VEF
00030 
00031 Implemente_instanciable(Porosites,"Porosites",Interprete);
00032

00034 {
00035   return Interprete::printOn(os);

00038 Entree& Porosites::readOn(Entree& is)
00039 {

00042 Entree& Porosites::interpreter(Entree& is)
00043 {
00044 
00045   int i;
00046   Nom nom_pb, nom_ss_zone;
00047   is >> nom_pb;
00048   if(! sub_type(Probleme_base, objet(nom_pb)))
00049     {
00050       Cerr << nom_pb << " is of type " << objet(nom_pb).que_suis_je() << finl;
00051       Cerr << "We waited an object of type Probleme_base" << finl;
00052       exit();
00053     }
00054   Probleme_base& pb=ref_cast(Probleme_base, objet(nom_pb));
00055 
00056   is >> nom_ss_zone;
00057   if(! sub_type(Sous_Zone, objet(nom_ss_zone)))
00058     {
00059       Cerr << nom_ss_zone << " is of type " << objet(nom_ss_zone).que_suis_je() << finl;
00060       Cerr << "We waited an object of type Sous_Zone" << finl;
00061       exit();
00062     }
00063 
00064   Sous_Zone& ssz=ref_cast(Sous_Zone, objet(nom_ss_zone));
00065 
00066   double porosite_volu=1;
00067   DoubleVect porosites_surf;
00068 
00069   Param param(que_suis_je());
00070   param.ajouter("Volumique",&porosite_volu);
00071   param.ajouter("Surfacique",&porosites_surf);
00072   param.ajouter_condition("value_of_Volumique_gt_0","Volumic porosity must be greater than 0");
00073   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00074 
00075   double porsurfmin=porosites_surf.local_min_vect();
00076   if(porsurfmin<=0)
00077     {
00078       Cerr << "You entered a surfacic porosity <=0 " << finl;
00079       exit();
00080     }
00081 
00082   const Zone_dis& la_zone_dis = pb.equation(0).zone_dis();
00083   if (!la_zone_dis.non_nul())
00084     {
00085       Cerr << "You must have discretized the problem before defining the porosities" << finl;
00086       exit();
00087     }
00088 
00089 // On passe par la zone_VF
00090 
00091   Zone_VF& zvf=ref_cast(Zone_VF, pb.equation(0).zone_dis().valeur());
00092   if (zvf.que_suis_je().debute_par("Zone_VEF"))
00093     {
00094       Cerr << "Porosites should no longer be used in VEF." << finl;
00095       Cerr << "Porosites_champ should be used instead." << finl;
00096       exit();
00097     }
00098   DoubleVect& porosite_elem = zvf.porosite_elem();
00099   DoubleVect& porosite_face = zvf.porosite_face();
00100   const IntTab& elem_faces = zvf.elem_faces();
00101   int nb_faces_elem = zvf.zone().nb_faces_elem();
00102   int elem;
00103 
00104   if( (porosite_volu!=1) && (porsurfmin!=1) )
00105     {
00106       for (i=0; i<ssz.nb_elem_tot(); i++)
00107         {
00108           elem = ssz(i);
00109           porosite_elem(elem)=porosite_volu;
00110           for (int j=0; j<nb_faces_elem; j++)
00111             {
00112               double norme_normale =0;
00113               int iii;
00114               for (iii=0; iii<dimension; iii++)
00115                 norme_normale+=zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii)*zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii);
00116 
00117               porosite_face(elem_faces(elem, j))=0.;
00118               for (iii=0; iii<dimension; iii++)
00119                 {
00120                   porosite_face(elem_faces(elem, j))+= porosites_surf(iii)*dabs(zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii))
00121                                                        *dabs(zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii))/norme_normale;
00122                 }
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126   else if(porosite_volu!=1)
00127     {
00128       Cerr << " The volumic porosities are used to calculate the surfacic porosities " << finl ;
00129       for (i=0; i<ssz.nb_elem_tot(); i++)
00130         {
00131           elem = ssz(i);
00132           porosite_elem(elem)=porosite_volu;
00133         }
00134       int nb_elem_tot = zvf.zone().nb_elem_tot();
00135       for (i=0; i<nb_elem_tot; i++)
00136         {
00137           for (int j=0; j<nb_faces_elem; j++)
00138             {
00139               int face_glob = elem_faces(i, j) ;
00140               int num_poly_vois = zvf.face_voisins(face_glob,1);
00141               int num_poly_vois1 = zvf.face_voisins(face_glob,0);
00142 
00143               if ((num_poly_vois != -1) && (num_poly_vois1 != -1))
00144                 porosite_face(face_glob) = (porosite_elem(num_poly_vois1)+porosite_elem(num_poly_vois))/2. ;
00145               else porosite_face(face_glob) =  porosite_elem(i) ;
00146 
00147             }
00148         }
00149     }
00150   else if(porsurfmin!=1)
00151     {
00152       Cerr << " The surfacic porosities are used to calculate the volumic porosities " << finl ;
00153       for (i=0; i<ssz.nb_elem_tot(); i++)
00154         {
00155           elem = ssz(i);
00156           for (int j=0; j<nb_faces_elem; j++)
00157             {
00158               double norme_normale =0;
00159               int iii;
00160               for (iii=0; iii<dimension; iii++)
00161                 norme_normale+=zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii)*zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii);
00162 
00163               porosite_face(elem_faces(elem, j))=0.;
00164               for (iii=0; iii<dimension; iii++)
00165                 {
00166                   porosite_face(elem_faces(elem, j))+= porosites_surf(iii)*zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii)
00167                                                        *zvf.face_normales(elem_faces(elem, j),iii)/norme_normale;
00168                 }
00169             }
00170         }
00171     }
00172   return is;
00173 }
